title: Exclusive Dating Restriction Zone - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Character Growth   Enemies Become Lovers   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Office Romance   Omegaverse   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: 민트란
description:
My name is Kim Joo-hyuk. I am Beta.

While working for the company, I had a realization.

There is no answer in this society where Alphas and Omegas love and hate one other.

I'm hoping that all of the Alpha executives, as well as the incredibly cute Omega employees, disappear.

All I need is retirement and a trip to Hawaii, not a relationship.

I do not allow any romance in my area.

It was a declaration of an exclusive dating restriction zone.>
